name: Gengar
flavorText:
Under a full moon,
this POKéMON
likes to mimic the shadows of
people and laugh
at their fright.

pokemon.name: Gastly
pokemon.flavorText:
Almost invisible,
this gaseous
POKéMON cloaks the target and
puts it to sleep
without notice.

pokemon.name: Haunter
pokemon.flavorText:
Because of its
ability to slip
through block walls, it is said
to be from an­
other dimension.
